dialogues.text: Hey, are you heading east towards the Malachite Hills? Watch out for poisonous enemies.

options.text: Have you seen any strange men passing by lately?

dialogues.text: Some men in black clothes headed east into Malachite Hills last night. They looked like they were in a hurry. Hope that helps!
Poison decreases your HP over time. Some abilities are capable of cleansing conditions.
If you don't have these abilities yet, you could buy an Antidote Potion from that market stall over there.
Potions such as Antidotes will grant you some resistance to Poison damage. Stronger potions will grant better resistance.
Resistance only partially decreases damage, it doesn't provide full immunity.
